data.title: Find the word
data.statement:
Given a list of complete words followed by a list of incomplete words.
Missing letters in incomplete words are marked with {{_}} (underscore).
Complete the incomplete words and output their completed form.
Solve the words using the word list.

Every word can be solved and there is only one unique solution.
The output is case-sensitive.

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read CompleteWord:string(1024)
read M:int
loop M read IncompleteWord:string(1024)
write solution...
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of complete words in the word list.
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> complete words
<<Line [[N]]+2:>> An integer [[M]] for the number of incomplete words.
<<Next [[M]] lines:>> incomplete words
data.outputDescription: <<[[M]] lines:>> Solved words in the same order

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a list of complete words followed by a list of incomplete words.
Missing letters in incomplete words are marked with _ (underscore).
Complete the incomplete words and output their completed form.
Solve the words using the word list.

Every word can be solved and there is only one unique solution.
The output is case-sensitive.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of complete words in the word list.
Next N lines: complete words
Line N+2: An integer M for the number of incomplete words.
Next M lines: incomplete words
Output
M lines: Solved words in the same order
Constraints
1 ≤ N,M ≤ 100
M ≤ N
Example
Input
2
Hello
World
1
Wo_ld
Output
World
